content: I really like this lipstick because it stays well and feels good when you put it on.
Love this natural color. It is not bold. It is a light matte color.
The color is perfect, it's so pretty! and I will buy one for my friends as a birthday gift!

I was looking for a lipstick color to go with a dress I bought for a wedding, which is Rose Gold. The color I bought went perfectly. This lipstick is also nice for everyday use. The only thing I don't like is that it does not stay on and you will need to re apply often.
I really love this lipstick! It lasts for a very long time while maintaining its beautiful color. I love using it because it’s a very useful color! This Chanel lipstick is worth buying for!
I love, love, love this. It is worth every penny. I want to stock pile it for when it is no longer sold.

I order 40 La Sensuelle Rouge Allure Velvet but when I received lipstick that is total different color on Macy’s Website. And then I checked on Chanel website that is different too. So be disappointed!
I like it make me a beautiful lip and smile................................................
title: Great lipstick
Matte brownish pink
perfect color
Nice color
Best Lipstick!!
Worth it
Different color
Best

name: ROUGE ALLURE VELVET Luminous Matte Lip Colour, Spring-Summer Makeup Collection 2018
